title: The OTM Interview: Signing to Drakeo, Inheriting His Opps, No Jumper Beef & More
description:
Blazzy chops it up with OTM with T-Rell's assistance, to talk about their relationship with Drakeo, their come up, their sound and their beef with AzChike and House Phone! ----- 00:00 Intro 0:39 OTM hate House Phone for criticizing their music 4:50 Pesos's dad in jail, mom working, so free to do whatever, whereas Duffy had both his parents cool AF in the house 6:13 Duffy been a child actor since he was 2 y/o 7:17 Duffy's mom most likely kept all the money he made as a child actor 7:48 Blazzy was almost in a Huggies commercial 9:44 Drakeo approached them to work together 11:31 OTM, "Off The Muscle" that's how they live life 15:09 Regarding AzChike's comment: "He been got killed off, he's a cornball" 15:55 The loss of Drakeo, their idol, and mentor, made them work even harder but it's traumatizing 18:37 Drakeo showed them love and he didn't have to do it, he just blessed them 19:05 They were in Big Bear w Drakeo one time, snowing outside, Drakeo walkin around shirtless, that was a great time 20:03 OTM met Drake with Drakeo 23:10 OTM say they run LA, say they look the best, best ice, if people hate that means they're ahead of everyone: "Drakeo ran LA! He created the LA culture" 25:54 OTM say Remble thought they were dissin them in their last tape 26:33 Remble turned down the T-Rell interview but went to Vlad, OTM make fun of Remble 30:18 OTM say people don't know the truth about Drakeo, it's deeper than what people think ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
